properties.Name: DayOfWeek
properties.Description:
The day(s) of the week that are applicable.

Ex.:
- Monday
- Tuesday
- Wednesday
- Thursday 
- Friday
- Saturday
- Sunday
- Weekdays (Monday - Friday)
- Weekends (Saturday - Sunday)

Columns.Name: DayOfWeekId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Day Of Week.

Columns.Name: DayOfWeekName
Columns.Description: The name of the Day Of Week.

Columns.Name: DayOfWeekDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Day Of Week.

Columns.Name: BusinessDayIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the associated day is a business day.

Columns.Name: WeekendIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the associated day falls on a weekend.
